title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Informal Learning Strategies to Address Urban Student Learning Gaps

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Scientific Concepts Comprehension and Educational Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to design science simulations reflecting urban students' daily contexts (home/community)
Learners develop at least two educational scenarios that reduce learning gaps using participatory informal learning strategies
Learners propose methods to enhance active participation and self-directed learning competencies by over 80% through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
